entries.journal_entry_description: Battle Imperial troops and stall their occupation of Echo Base while Rebel Alliance personnel and equipment are cleared from the base.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Echo Base Command Center has been rigged with 3 bombs to destroy anything that might fall into the hands of the Empire. Don't allow Imperials troops to stop those bombs from detonating.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Protect the Bombs in the Command Center
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Head to the Command Center and protect the command personnel as they prepare to depart.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Free the Medical Bay from Imperial troops and hold it while medical personnel escape.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Head to the Medical Center and protect medical personnel as they evacuate Echo Base.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Halt the Imperial assault on the Lower Hangar Equipment Room and allow the crew members there to evacuate with their equipment.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Secure the Equipment Room and the Lower Hangar
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Protect crew members while they evacuate the Echo Base equipment Stores.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Head to the Grotto which houses theThermal Generator room and drive out any Imperial forces in the area. All thermal generator equipment must be evacuated from the base.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Protect crew members while they evacuate the thermal power core area.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Head to the Command Center and secure that location. Command personnel must be allowed to evacuate and the Command Center must be destroyed to prevent any data stored there from falling into the hands of the Empire.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Protect as many of the non-essential base personnel as possible as they  make their way out to the transports.
entries.task12_journal_entry_title: Protect the Evacuation of Non-Essential Base Personnel
